title: Trump administration terminates privacy officials at agency overseeing government hiring and firing
summary: Trump terminated multiple members of the Office of Personnel Management’s privacy and communications teams—those tasked with handling FOIA requests and safeguarding public records—effectively cutting off external access to information—including info on security clearances granted to Elon Musk and his operatives
